channel.title: How do i ip-ban someone?
channel.description:
ok,
im admin on a server but when i tried to ipban it didnt work i used the command ::ipban (name here)
is that the right command or is it a different one?
thanks.

item.title: How do i ip-ban someone?
item.dc:creator: @N0_N4M3 N0 N4M3
item.description:
@N0_N4M3 wrote:

[quote=“reza, post:1, topic:61708”]ok,

im admin on a server but when i tried to ipban it didnt work i used the command ::ipban (name here)

is that the right command or is it a different one?

thanks.[/quote]

First of all, you need to type ::checkip players name, then after you have there ip, type ::ipban playersip. Hope that helps.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i ip-ban someone?
item.dc:creator: @NickMoran06 NickMoran06
item.description:
@NickMoran06 wrote:

You manually ban their asses instead of getting your PC to do it for you.
